name: Unaging Memory
desc: After an ally target uses an attack, deals Additional DMG equal to 1% of ATK to attacked target(s) for every stack of allies' total "Obsession" stacks.
enhanced_desc: After an ally target uses an attack, deals Additional DMG equal to 1.5% of ATK to attacked target(s) for every stack of allies' total "Obsession" stacks.
